title: Pixel 5 large battery drain in minutes
content:
I have had my pixel 5 since the beginning of November bought it directly from google store and has been working great until this morninig.
I had my phone plugged into charger all night but as soon as I started using it the battery percentage was going down 1% every min or so.  I decided to reboot the phone when it hit 80% and when it came back on it was at 20%.  The only thing I did was check email and facebook but the battery usage at first was showing nothing and then after reboot it just shows facebook.  
Has anyone else had this issue?
